items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: 28% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Divination Distillate
explicitMods: 12% increased Quantity of Items found during Effect
28% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Knowledge is fermented in pain and loss
Distilled with reflection
To quench the thirst of those
who dream of enlightenment

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fire an arrow that leaves a spore pod in its wake. The spore pod blooms, firing thorn arrows, which travel for a short time before dissipating. Modifiers that cause additional projectiles to be fired will only apply to the initial arrows, each of which leaves its own spore pod.
explicitMods: 60% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Each Spore Pod fires 6 Thorn Arrows
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires a piercing shot that travels until it reaches the targeted location. It will then fire projectiles out in all directions from that point, which will travel for a short time before disappearing.
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +8% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 54% more Damage with Ailments
Supported Skills deal 80% less Damage with Hits
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Damage over Time
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: +28% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires a poisonous arrow which deals chaos damage in an area on impact.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow into the air to land at a targeted location, dealing area damage. The arrow sticks in the ground where it lands, and periodically fires a beam of lightning to you, dealing area damage between the arrow and you.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports bow attack skills, causing them to trigger when you've spent enough mana in total on other bow attacks. Cannot modify the skills of minions. Cannot support totems, traps, mines, Vaal skills, or channelling skills
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 10% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Supported Skills deal 1% more Damage with Hits and Ailments per 1 Mana Cost

Supported Skills Trigger once total Mana Spent on other Bow
Attacks exceeds 300% of their Mana Cost
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that fire projectiles from the user. Does not affect projectiles fired from other locations as secondary effects.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 20% increased Projectile Damage
Supported Skills also fire Projectiles from up to 4 points on each side of you
Supported Skills deal 21% less Projectile Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: 19% chance to gain 1 Rage when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy
20% chance to gain Phasing for 4 seconds on Kill
items.descrText: Right click to apply this to your weapons. Only one Tincture in your belt can be applied to your weapons at a time. Requires the Coated Blade Passive to be allocated on Warden of the Maji Passive Skill Tree to use this item.

items.name: Pandemonium Quill
explicitMods: Adds 5 to 125 Lightning Damage to Attacks
Bow Attacks fire an additional Arrow
fracturedMods: +26% to Damage over Time Multiplier with Attack Skills

items.name: Dying Sun
explicitMods: 20% increased Area of Effect during Effect
Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: All things must die.
Whether you burn out or explode is up to you.

items.name: Pain Salvation
implicitMods: 8% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage
craftedMods: 45% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Rare or Unique Enemies

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Chaos, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their chaos resistance.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies have -30% to Chaos Resistance
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 406 Base Fire Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Consumes Rage at an accelerating rate to provide a powerful buff, granting more attack damage, attack speed, movement speed, and less damage taken.
explicitMods: At least 5 Rage required to start Berserking
Each second, 20% more Rage loss Rate
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.typeLine: Alchemist's Topaz Flask of the Order
craftedMods: 30% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Taste of Hate
explicitMods: 15% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain 13% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that remains in the ground behind its final target, tethering that enemy to it. Ensnared enemies always count as moving, and have less movement speed while trying to break the snare. The snare will break if they leave the area of effect.
explicitMods: Ensnared Enemies take 20% increased Projectile Damage from Attack Hits
Each Snare applies 40% less Movement Speed to Normal or Magic Enemies
Each Snare applies 30% less Movement Speed to Rare Enemies
Each Snare applies 25% less Movement Speed to Unique Enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Adds 1 to 27 Lightning Damage to Attacks
50% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage
flavourText: "There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.
